tobj.main¶

TinyObj v0.1.0, a tiny object format for freedom.

This module provides the public API for the TinyObj format, including functions for deserialization (loads, load) and serialization (dumps, dump).

Functions¶

loads(→ Optional[Dict[str, Any]])

Parse TOBJ from a string.

Parse TinyObj from a file object.

Test serialization and deserialization integrity

Run all edge case tests

Module Contents¶

tobj.main.loads(string_code: str, *, filename: str = '<string>') → Dict[str, Any] | None[source]¶

Parse TOBJ from a string.

The primary entry point for deserializing TinyObj code. It chains the Lexer, Parser, and Interpreter to convert the source string into a Python dictionary.

Parameters:

  • string_code (str) – TOBJ source code.

  • filename (str) – Name to show in error messages. Defaults to “<string>”.

Returns:

Parsed Python dict, or None if the input string is empty.

Return type:

Optional[Dict[str, Any]]

Raises:

  • LexerError – An error encountered during the tokenization phase.

  • ParserError – An error encountered during the AST construction phase.

  • InterpreterError – An error encountered during the final dict construction phase.

tobj.main.load(file) → Dict[str, Any] | None[source]¶

Parse TinyObj from a file object.

Reads the entire content of a file-like object and passes it to loads.

Parameters:

file – File-like object to read from (must have a .read() method).

Returns:

Parsed Python dict.

Return type:

Optional[Dict[str, Any]]

tobj.main.dumps(data: Dict[str, Any]) → str[source]¶

Converts a Python dictionary into a TinyObj string format.

This function recursively serializes nested dictionaries and lists into the object (*), property (>), and list (-) format of TinyObj.

:param The Python dictionary to serialize. :type Dict[str, Any] :return: The resulting TinyObj source code string. :rtype: str

tobj.main.dump(data: Dict[str, Any], file) → None[source]¶

Converts a Python dictionary to TinyObj format and writes it to a file object.

:param The Python dictionary to dump. :type data: Dict[str, Any] :param file: File-like object to write the resulting TinyObj string to.
